title: Delete Courier Parcel by Id
description: Delete an existing Courier Parcel by Id
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

returns.description: <DeleteParcelResponse> Details of whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: Code
fields.description: More information as to the result of the operation

enum.name: OK
enum.description: Parcel was successfully updated in our system

enum.name: ParcelNotFound
enum.description: The specified parcel does not exist

enum.name: MemberIsNotSeller
enum.description: This member is not the seller of this auction

enum.name: ParcelIsSystemGenerated
enum.description: This parcel is system generated and cannot be deleted
